title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks drop, Treasury yields spike as traders await inflation, earnings data - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks drop, Treasury yields spike as traders await inflation, earnings data  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stock futures pointed to a lower open Monday morning as investors looked ahead to the start of corporate earnings season this week and a bevy of new economic data as the Federal Reserve prepares to accelerate its moves to counter inflation.
